alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson, southern Benton, southwestern Linn and northern Iowa Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle Plaine, or 13 miles west of Marengo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Luzerne around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Marengo, Blairstown, Newhall, Norway, Atkins and Walford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Iowa.
